definition: thistle/common sowthistle (Sonchus oleraceus)/bitter (taste)/cruel/flowering grass in profusion

sentences.english: Years later, the whole building is gone, just like the sand Mandala .
sentences.chinese: 五年以后，整座大楼都消失了，就象沙曼荼罗一样。

sentences.english: This essay attempts to approach a study on Hevajra Mandalas.
sentences.chinese: 本文将就其中的喜金刚曼荼罗进行探讨。

sentences.english: A mandala made from a photograph of yellow and magenta chrysanthemum.
sentences.chinese: 由黄色与紫红色的菊花做成的曼荼罗的图片。

sentences.english: Mandalas are circular designs arranged in layers radiating from the center.
sentences.chinese: 曼荼罗是从中心往外水平辐射排列的圆环设计。

sentences.english: Design template for yoga studio with mandala ornament and splashes in watercolor style.
sentences.chinese: 曼荼罗装饰背景的瑜伽工作室的设计模板。

sentences.english: Like the mandala, knot designs are by definition rich in symmetries .
sentences.chinese: 像曼荼罗一样，结设计是依照对称性方面丰富的解读。

definition: Nirvana (in Buddhist scripture)/Lord Brahma (the Hindu Creator)
the Eternal Wheel of life in Buddhism
Mt Meru or Sumeru, sacred mountain in Buddhist and Jain tradition/Mt Xumi in Guyuan 固原[Gu4 yuan2], Ningxia, with many Buddhist cave statues
Ceaseless pain (Sanskrit: Avici), one of the Buddhist hells/fig. hell/hell on earth
time immemorial/origin of the universe/the world
Asura, malevolent spirits in Indian mythology
